comments.text: This stuff smells amazing and I love the texture!! Not so much buttery, more like a whipped cream cheese!! Love this, will be reordering! I am new to Alba products, my daughter introduced me to them because they make a sun screen that is coral reef safe and she is very much into ocean animal preservation. You won’t be sorry you tried it! It is a string smell, but for a body butter you will love it!
comments.title: Smells Amazing!!!
comments.author: mitchellitis
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian, Kukui Nut Body Cream, 6.5 Ounce

comments.text:
I hate sunscreen in general--for it's texture and smell. But, being the palest family on Earth makes it a daily necessity. I was pleasantly surprised to actually like the smell of this product! It's a light fruity fragrance. It has a smooth texture like lotion and glided on my skin without being too thick or greasy and no white marks. A little goes a long way too! I could hardly believe I was putting on sunscreen and not regular body lotion. My kids had no issue with it either! They let me put this stuff on their little faces without complaint since it goes on so smoothly. Most importantly, this product did it's job and we were sunburn free. The tube is small--4 ounces--but I don't care because it's so worth having something that goes on easy and doesn't make us greasy and stinky. I bought several tubes--one for each member of the family.

*If this review was helpful, please click 'yes' below. Thanks!*
comments.title: I hate sunscreens, but...
comments.author: carrotkhan
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica, Kids Sunscreen SPF 45, 4 Ounce

comments.text: Great product.  I use it for my moisterizer.
comments.title: Great product. I use it for my moisterizer
comments.author: martha rasmussen
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian, Aloe Vera Sunscreen SPF 30, 4 Ounce

comments.text: I was really happy with this product at first. It seemed to reduce the puffiness and darkness under my eyes and it just felt refreshing to put on. I was using it once a day and then all of the sudden any time I try to use it it burns my skin like the seventh circle of hell! Very disappointed.
comments.title: Great until it wasn't!
comments.author: osman baig
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian, Green Tea Eye Gel, 1 Ounce

comments.text:
Horribly white
It looks like I spray painted my kids and it didn't even wash off after I gave my kids a shower.
I am really upset because I purchased it right before my vacation and was stuck at the beach with this white spray.
comments.title: Spray paint :(
comments.author: liana hall
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Sensitive Fragrance Free Mineral Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30, 4 oz

comments.text:
This is a simple, go-to leave in conditioner for my very curly (3a) hair. It leaves my hair soft and manageable. I actually use it as a styling cream too, as I apply it after my other leave in conditioner and just style my hair afterwards.

When my hair is being difficult during hormonal times, or when I don't want to have to mess around with the styling, I use this leave-in. It is consistently solid. I recommend this to other curly haired 3a folks who do a wash and go like I do.
comments.title: Good Go-To Product
comments.author: toni harmer
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Advanced, Leave-In Conditioner, 7 Ounce

comments.text: I ordered this because it has no avobenzone--zoom in on the Active Ingredients in the photos, there's no avobenzone. The cans that showed up at my house look exactly like these pictures, except that avobenzone is literally the first ingredient. Other ingredients are different, too. I assume Alba changed their product, but Amazon needs to change their description to reflect that.
comments.title: This contains avobenzone
comments.author: svata
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Hawaiian, Coconut Spray Sunscreen SPF 50, 6 Ounce

comments.text: Love this product - and I've tried many.  It's messy - so I use it in the shower .  I use it first on my face - then onto my neck, shoulders ......
comments.title: Facial treat
comments.author: aaron ragsdale
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica ACNEdote Face & Body Scrub, 8 Ounces Tube (Pack of 2)

comments.text:
As every Alba Botanica product, this one is wonderful !
The texture is very light and the scrub is gentle but efficient and my skin was very soft after I used it. And among all this, it smells very good like a sweet orange smell. I love it and will definitely buy it again !
comments.title: this one is wonderful! The texture is very light and the scrub ...
comments.author: emily h
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Good and Clean Toxin Release Scrub, 4 Ounce

comments.text: I've been using Alba Bontanica for 5+years. This line of Acnedote is awesome! I break out like every other month, but since I bought this moisturizer its kept my skin from breaking out!! I love it and a little goes a long way. I received my package quick and the seller is a great company! Definitely recommend!
comments.title: Awesome product!
comments.author: orieyenta
comments.items_name: Alba Botanica Acnedote, Oil Control Lotion, 2 Ounce
